q: Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern,'' Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. Mirafiori vote had implications far beyond the limits of Turin. Business leaders say a decision by Mr Sergio Marchionne not to invest in Italy would have had devastating effect on already low foreign direct investment in Italy. Turnout was very high because people know this is a vote about the future of Italy, said Eros Panicali, secretary-general of the Uil union movement which had backed Mr Sergio Marchionne 's plan. Music mogul Simon Cowell , who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year, loves children but says he is getting too old to have them. I worry about it because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70... ''Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. A full-size front-wheel or all-wheel-drive sedan and even some Fiat brand vehicles also could be part of that family. The architecture would be a lot more capable and allow us to make a minivan-like vehicle as well as others, Sergio Marchionne said. The family would be part of a larger goal of getting 80 percent of its vehicles from four or five architectures, a path he said Chrysler is just starting now. ''
